titles.title: Hark The Savior's Knocking (little work nice)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let Him in - Let Him in He's knocking at your heart Let Him in - Oh let Him in Let Him in your heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hark the Savior's knocking knocking Knocking at your heart Oh do not be hardened hardened Lest He should depart Rise and open up your heart Quickly let Him in Life divine He'll give you give you And forgive your sin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Why should you still tarry tarry Keep Him waiting there He is kind and gracious gracious Merciful and dear Listen to His tender voice Do not grieve His heart Won't you let Him enter enter And His grace impart{/lang-eng}
